unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja? Heard he twisted his ankle during the Ranji Trophy match in Nagpur. Dr. Sharma said it might be serious. Hope he recovers soon! Also, what about Bumrah's back? It's been a while. Rs. 5 lakh for a quick recovery, maybe? Heard the NCA has a new rehab facility, 2000 sq ft.
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Jadeja? Heard he twisted his ankle during the Ranji Trophy match in Nagpur. Doctor Sharma said it might be serious. Hope he recovers soon! Also, what about Bumrah's back? It's been a while. Rupees five lakh for a quick recovery, maybe? Heard the N C A has a new rehab facility, two thousand square feet.
